resources.string: Status: showing the currently played song. And maybe adding some control buttons to pause/start playing.

On this screen: This is the main screen of the app, at the top there is a statusbar showing the currently played song, there are buttons to navigate to other screens, and this explanation at the bottom.
On this screen: This screen shows the list of the songs are currently on the playlist. With the buttons we can jump to the details screen or remove the song from the list.
Removing the song from the playlist..
On this screen: This screen shows the list of the songs currently available to the app. With the buttons we can jump to the details screen or add the song to the playlist.
Adding the song to the playlist..

On this screen: This screen shows the details of the selected song. From the main screen it will show the details of the currently played song, otherwise the details of the song from the playlist or library. Tapping on the image will bring back to the main screen.
